author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This is a fix for L1T EG emulator of relaxing the ID cuts (including HoE) for high pt objects above tower saturation point (127.5 GeV)

It is basicaly adjusted PR https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/353

This change has already been made in the firmware at P5.

Conflicts resolved:
    L1Trigger/L1TCalorimeter/src/firmware/Stage2Layer2EGammaAlgorithmFirmwareImp1.cc
title: L1T EG relax of ID cuts (including HoE) for high pt objects above tower saturation
